doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

description.text: Find restriction enzymes producing a specific overhang

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.label: Minimum cuts per re (value from 1 to 1000)
Maximum cuts per re
Force single site only cuts Yes No
Use 3' overhang e.g. bamhi has ctag as a 5' overhang, and apai has ccgg as 3' overhang. Yes No
Allow blunt end cutters Yes No
Allow sticky end cutters Yes No
Allow ambiguous matches Yes No
Allow circular dna Yes No

Use methylation data?
Yes No
If this is set then RE recognition sites will not match methylated bases.
Only enzymes with suppliers Yes No
Create html output Yes No
Limits reports to one isoschizomer Yes No
Sort output alphabetically Yes No
Show fragment lengths Yes No
Name of the output file (e_outfile)

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: If this is set then RE recognition sites will not match methylated bases.

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

parameter.name: e_min
parameter.prompt: Minimum cuts per re (value from 1 to 1000)

format.code: ("", " -min=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 1 is required
Value less than or equal to 1000 is required

interface.label: Minimum cuts per re (value from 1 to 1000)

format.code: ("", " -max=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

interface.label: Force single site only cuts Yes No

parameter.name: e_threeprime
parameter.prompt: Use 3' overhang e.g. bamhi has ctag as a 5' overhang, and apai has ccgg as 3' overhang.

interface.label: Use 3' overhang e.g. bamhi has ctag as a 5' overhang, and apai has ccgg as 3' overhang. Yes No
Allow blunt end cutters Yes No
Allow sticky end cutters Yes No

comment.text: If this is set then RE recognition sites will not match methylated bases.

interface.label:
Use methylation data?
Yes No
If this is set then RE recognition sites will not match methylated bases.
